hero-subtitle: MENA #1 platform connect youth to climate & environment opportunities | From MENA Youth to MENA Youth
commitments-text: At Green Gate 4 MY, we cultivate opportunities and generate real impact. We are convinced that every green idea or youthful voice can reshape the future... This is our harvestâ€”shared through data, initiatives, and youth-led stories.
opportunities-title: What do we do at Green Gate?
opportunities-text: At Green Gate, we are committed to empowering youth with various opportunities in the climate and sustainable fields, raising awareness of environmental issues, fostering innovation, and connecting them with regional and global experts and organizations to enable real, lasting impact in their communities.
newsletter-text: Subscribe to our newsletter to stay updated with the latest opportunities, events, and news from Green Gate. Join thousands of youth across MENA who are making a difference..
